author: Andrew Griffin
description: The world is being invaded by “alien” species that could cause huge problems, scientists have warned. Our rapidly changing world is bringing new types of invasive species that are able to trigger disruption – potentially including new kinds of diseases that could ravage animals and plants.
title: Scientists urge people to act on the deadly threat of invasion by 'alien' species

description: Caesar and the Colonel are pitted against each other in an epic battle that will determine the fate of both their species and the future of the planet.
title: War for the Planet of the Apes - Final Trailer - IGN Video

author: BBC News
description: A fishing ban extension is said to be the best hope for the world's most endangered marine species.
title: Rare Mexican porpoise faces 'imminent extinction'

author: By Colin Fernandez Science Correspondent For The Daily Mail
description: Henderson Island is a sanctuary to a host of threatened species including the Henderson Petrel and Henderson Crake, and its beaches are a nesting site for the endangered green turtle.
title: World's most polluted island revealed

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/alison-branley/6470766, http://www.abc.net.au/news/sophie-scott/167202
description: Jenny Specis knew something was wrong with her uncle Themis when he asked her if she wanted an ice cream — he doesn't even have a downstairs at home.
title: Delirium patient who helped researchers make breakthrough 'felt like a sick old man'
